title: The New Baby
description:
Mercer Mayer's Little Critter has a brand-new baby sister in this classic, funny, and heartwarming book.Whether Little Critter is rocking her to sleep, helping change diapers, or pushing the stroller, both parents and children alike will relate to this heart-warming story. A perfect way to help a soon-to-be older sibling welcome a younger one!
Mercer Mayer's
 
Little Critter
 stories, which address all the major issues of growing up, are perennial favorites of parents and children alike.
author: Mercer Mayer
